revised_title: Anatomical and Physiological Study of Hepatic Parenchyma and Hepatic Ducts
tldr: The author examines the contents of hepatic ducts and compares them to the pancreas, concluding that hepatic cells are analogous to endogenous cells of other glands and play a role in the secretion of bile. This study provides insight into the anatomical and physiological relationship between hepatic cells and the hepatic ducts.
